div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 56 Domokos, Thessaly, 1935 (336) Burial: c. 350 B.C. (T) Contents: 16-18+ AR Larissa: 1-2 st.?; 5 dr. Locri Opuntii: 4 st. Tanagra: 1 st. (as BMC pl. 9, 11-12) Thebes: 5 st. Aegina: 1 st. Disposition: unknown Vlasto's record of varieties on file in ANS
